title: Bill Mulvihill on Stadium and Sports Financing
itunes:title: Bill Mulvihill on Stadium and Sports Financing
description:
Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and guest host Damian Sassower as they discuss stadium financing, the high demand for new construction and the financial health of sports franchises with Bill Mulvihill, senior vice president and head of sports finance group at US Bancorp. All that and more on Bloomberg's Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
